price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងជាអ្នកធ្វើឱ្យរស់ និងធ្វើឱ្យស្លាប់ ហើយមកចំពោះយើងជាកន្លែងវិលត្រឡប់។
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
